title: My Special Ability is Perfect Replication - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   School Life   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Ability Steal   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Cannibalism   Clones   Cultivation   Evolution   Familial Love   Fast Cultivation   Game Elements   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Nationalism   Outer Space   Racism   Ruthless Protagonist   Soul Power   Spatial Manipulation   Special Abilities   Time Manipulation   Time Skip   Weak to Strong
author: Panda Reunion   The Little Panda   Tuanyuan   团圆小熊猫
description:
After transmigrating to this world where spiritual energy is revived, I realized that it’s a world rampaged by Direbeasts. But what is most exciting is that humans with special abilities do exist! It’s awesome to witness control of thunder and fire, titan’s transformation, limb regeneration, teleportation, telepathy, precognition and many more. 

And guess what? I have them all.>
